caption: An explosive, high-energy K-pop and EDM track driven by a relentless four-on-the-floor beat and a pulsing synth bassline. The arrangement opens with a bright piano melody and shimmering arpeggiated synths before slamming into the main groove. A powerful, clear male lead vocal delivers an anthemic melody, punctuated by energetic ad-libs and hype-man shouts. The production is dense with layered synthesizers, including soaring leads, atmospheric pads, and dynamic FX like risers and sweeps that build tension into the explosive choruses. A mid-song instrumental break features a melodic synth lead and vocal chops, leading into a final, climactic chorus and an abrupt ending with a tape-stop sound effect.
lyrics:
[Intro]
[Synth arpeggio and pads]

[Verse  1]
[ko] hwangholhan i jilseo-e neon ppajyeo

[en] (oh yeah)

[ko] lideum wi-e sinhoneul jilleo

[en] (oh, let's go)

[ko] eodum sog-e bich-eul kkeul-eo
[ko] modeun geos-i bultago


[Pre-Chorus]
[ko] bich-i nal mag-eulyeo
[ko] moduga geudaelo bichna
[ko] geo-ul sog-e bichwojwo
[ko] naneun jasin-ui jibjunghae


[Chorus]
[ko] oelo-un i jilseo gip-eojyeo

[en] (yeah, yeah)

[ko] lideum wi-e him-eul jwi-yeo

[en] (let's go)

[ko] saelo-un sidaeleul yeol-eo

[en] (oh yeah)

[ko] gaseumsog-e bulkkoch-i pi-eo


[Verse  2]
[ko] geodaehan mudae sog-eseo
[ko] nan tae-eonal geo-ya
[ko] modeun geos-i choego-ui jilseo
[ko] uli hamkke chumchwo


[Bridge]
[ko] bichgwa eodum-i salajigo
[ko] ulin seololeul bichwo
[ko] eunmilhan i sungan sog-eseo
[ko] ulin hamkke mandeul-eoga


[Chorus]
[ko] oelo-un i jilseo gip-eojyeo

[en] (yeah, yeah)

[ko] lideum wi-e him-eul jwi-yeo

[en] (let's go)

[ko] saelo-un sidaeleul yeol-eo

[en] (oh yeah)

[ko] gaseumsog-e bulkkoch-i pi-eo


[Instrumental Break]
[Synth lead melody with vocal chops]

[Outro]
[Synth arpeggio fades out]
[abrupt silence]
